tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people feel that manufacturers and supermarkets have the responsibility to reduce the amount of packaging of goods. Others argue that customers should avoid buying goods with a lot of packaging. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
